effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an []{pokemon:exeggcute} into []{pokemon:exeggutor}, a []{pokemon:gloom} into []{pokemon:vileplume}, a []{pokemon:nuzleaf} into []{pokemon:shiftry}, a []{pokemon:pansage} into []{pokemon:simisage}, or a []{pokemon:weepinbell} into []{pokemon:victreebel}.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves an Exeggcute into Exeggutor, a Gloom into Vileplume, a Nuzleaf into Shiftry, a Pansage into Simisage, or a Weepinbell into Victreebel.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ある　特定の　ポケモンを
進化させる　不思議な　石。
はっぱの　模様が　ある。

A peculiar stone that can make
certain species of Pokémon evolve.
It has an unmistakable leaf pattern.

Pietra particolare che fa evolvere determinate
specie di Pokémon. Riporta l’immagine
di una foglia.

Curiosa piedra que hace evolucionar a
determinadas especies de Pokémon. Tiene
grabada una hoja.

Dieser spezielle Stein löst bei bestimmten
Pokémon die Entwicklung aus. Er hat ein
Blattmuster.

Une pierre étrange qui fait évoluer certaines
espèces de Pokémon. Une feuille est dessinée
dessus.

어느 특정 포켓몬을
진화시키는 이상한 돌.
잎사귀 무늬가 있다.

ある　とくていの　ポケモンを
しんかさせる　ふしぎな　いし。
はっぱの　もようが　ある。

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It has a leaf pattern.

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It has a leaf pattern.

Une pierre étrange qui fait évoluer
certaines espèces de Pokémon.
Une feuille est dessinée dessus.

species of Pokémon evolve.
It has a leaf pattern.

It has a leaf pattern.

species of POKéMON evolve.
It has a leaf pattern.

Makes certain
species of POKéMON
evolve.
